description: Windows schtasks 兼容修复 - 命令不可用时不阻断 onboarding

replacements.throw new Error(`schtasks unavailable: $: throw new Error(`schtasks unavailable: ${detail || "unknown error"}. On Windows, run in PowerShell/CMD or skip daemon install.`.trim());
replacements.\" Run PowerShell as Administrator or re: " 请以管理员身份运行 PowerShell，或跳过守护进程安装重新运行。"
